newsitem.title: USA: Netscape, NCR sign services pact.
newsitem.headline: Netscape, NCR sign services pact.

text.p: Netscape Communications Corp on Wednesday said it and NCR Corp have signed a global services agreement making NCR the first Netscape original equipment manufacturer partner to become a Netscape Global Systems Integration partner.
With the designation of NCR as a global systems partner, it will be able to certify members of NCR's worldwide services team on Netscape's client and server software.
In addition, NCR will establish several centers in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Africa and Asia/Pacific to provide systems integration services using Netscape software.
